org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model

Class RelatedKeyword

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model.RelatedKeyword

  • public class RelatedKeyword
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a Related Keyword as it is currently modeled in Stanbol. A RelatedKeyword is a concept related to a initial Search Keyword extracted from a Semantic Source that currently can be WordNet or an Ontology within Stanbol. Each RelatedKeyword has a relatedness score with the search keyword.
    Author:
    Rafa Haro
